name: Dorcas International Institute of Rhode Island - Citizenship and Immigration Services
description: Offers low-cost legal services to immigrants and refugees, including assistance with citizenship and immigration processes. They have staff accredited by the U.S. Department of Justice
services: Arabic-speaking Legal aid in Rhode-Island consultation

name: Catholic Charities of Providence - Office of Immigration and Refugee Services
description: Provides immigration legal services as a member agency of the Catholic Legal Immigration Network, Inc. They offer assistance with various immigration matters and have staff fluent in multiple languages
services: Arabic-speaking Legal aid in Rhode-Island consultation

name: Rhode Island Legal Services (RILS)
description: The main provider of low-cost legal aid in Rhode Island, serving low-income individuals. They may have staff or access to translators for various languages
services: Arabic-speaking Legal aid in Rhode-Island consultation

name: Rhode Island Bar Association Volunteer Lawyer Program (VLP)
description: Provides pro bono legal services to qualified low-income Rhode Islanders. The program includes attorneys who are fluent in several languages
services: Arabic-speaking Legal aid in Rhode-Island consultation

name: The Immigrant Coalition of Rhode Island
description: This coalition connects individuals with immigration attorneys and services. They list organizations like Dorcas International Institute of Rhode Island and the Immigration Clinic at Roger Williams University School of Law
services: Arabic-speaking Legal aid in Rhode-Island consultation

name: Immigration Clinic at Roger Williams University School of Law
description: Provides legal representation to immigrants seeking lawful permanent residence or defense against removal proceedings
services: Arabic-speaking Legal aid in Rhode-Island consultation

name: Community Action Partnership of Providence County
description: As part of the Rhode Island Community Action Association, they offer a range of programs to help individuals and families, which may include referrals to legal services
services: Arabic-speaking Legal aid in Rhode-Island consultation

name: American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) of Rhode Island
description: Focuses on civil rights and liberties, including immigrant rights. While they may not offer direct legal representation in all cases, they can provide information and referrals
services: Arabic-speaking Legal aid in Rhode-Island consultation

name: Rhode Island Disability Law Center (RIDLC)
description: Provides free legal assistance to persons with disabilities. While not specific to Arabic speakers, they offer services to vulnerable populations
services: Arabic-speaking Legal aid in Rhode-Island consultation

name: Rhode Island Bar Association Lawyer Referral Service
description: Can help connect individuals with attorneys, some of whom may speak Arabic or utilize translation services
services: Arabic-speaking Legal aid in Rhode-Island consultation
